MSGs.DescriptionMSG: This is the assistant bot for the GitFoss channel. Using this bot, you can set up brief information about any project on GitHub or GitLab with just one click.
MSGs.CreateMSG: Please send a link for a project in github or gitlab

ErrorMSGs.UrlErrorMsg: The project was not found, please check if the link is correct
ErrorMSGs.UnsupportedLink: The link is not supported, please send a link on github or gitlab
